article: How to Check Your Visa Gift Card Balance
intro: When using a Visa gift card, you may occasionally lose track of its precise balance while making purchases. If you need to know how much you have left on the card, it's easy to check your balance. To check your balance, you have two options. You can look your balance up online or call the toll free number on the back of your card.

steps.title: Check your balance.
steps.subtitle: When you've entered all the numbers correctly, hit "Check my balance." You will then be redirected to a screen that shows you your balance as well as any recent transactions.
sub-points: If there is an error, go back and carefully reenter the numbers. It's possible you entered something wrong. If you still can't check your balance, call the toll-free number on the back of your card.
